channel.title: Posts on Max Shen
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Max Shen

item.title: The beauty of C++ STL algorithm and lambda
item.description: In this tutorial I refactor some C++ functions several times with STL algorithm and lambda to make them more concise and readable.

item.title: Build your modern Neovim config in Lua
item.description: In this tutorial you’ll learn how to build and structure your modern Neovim config in Lua. I’ll go through options, mappings, autocmds and plugins.

item.title: Vim Command Workflow
item.description: In this tutorial, I’ll share my Vim command workflow and give you some guidelines about how to move and edit text in Vim efficiently.

item.title: Vim Basic Commands
item.description: In this tutorial, you’ll learn the basic commands in Normal, Command-line and Insert mode that you need to know to work in Vim efficiently.
